key_communications.content: Eva Dubin emails Epstein 'superb!!!!' about Vicky Ward Vanity Fair article mentioning Leon Black, Mort Zuckerman
Epstein emails Eva Dubin about Doe v. Trump dismissal with subject 'told you, the case was a fake'. Eva responds 'EEEE'
key_communications.significance: Epstein and Eva Dubin celebrating Trump lawsuit dismissal 4 days before election

key_communications.content: Glenn Dubin sends Epstein New Yorker article 'Michael Cohen and the End Stage of the Trump Presidency'

glenn_eva_dubin_relationship.note: Eva Dubin was formerly Eva Andersson, Swedish model who dated Epstein in 1980s before marrying Glenn Dubin

boris_nikolic_connection.identity: Boris Nikolic - Bill Gates' former science advisor, Biomatics Capital founder
boris_nikolic_connection.context: Epstein sends Nikolic Vicky Ward article
boris_nikolic_connection.nikolic_response: What is this??? When this will stop. This is crazy. And you are NOT 57;) And certainly you are NOT socially awkward. Who is that idiot.
boris_nikolic_connection.significance: Named as backup executor in Epstein's will (August 2019). Close enough to defend Epstein personally.

vicky_ward_article_reveals.title: Jeffrey and Ghislaine: Notes on New York's Oddest Alliance
key_quotes: Leon Black, Mort Zuckerman and a few other financiers hang out with him
She is passionate about Bill Clinton with whom she is close friends
Jeffrey knows what he's talking about far more than 'Andy' does
When it comes to international business, Jeffrey knows what he's talking about

trump_lawsuit_monitoring.epstein_subject_line: told you, the case was a fake
trump_lawsuit_monitoring.significance: Epstein monitoring Trump's legal troubles and sharing news with associates

new_entities_discovered.name: Glenn Dubin
new_entities_discovered.role: Highbridge Capital co-founder. Named in victim allegations. 55 documents in archive. April 2018 sent Epstein Cohen/Trump article.

new_entities_discovered.name: Eva Dubin
new_entities_discovered.role: Glenn Dubin's wife, former Epstein girlfriend Eva Andersson. Regular email correspondent. Celebrated Trump lawsuit dismissal with Epstein Nov 2016.

new_entities_discovered.name: Boris Nikolic
new_entities_discovered.role: Bill Gates' former science advisor, Biomatics Capital founder. Defended Epstein March 2011. Named backup executor of Epstein's will.

new_entities_discovered.name: Stephen Kosslyn
new_entities_discovered.role: Harvard psychologist, later Minerva Schools founding dean. Named in victim allegations March 2011.

new_entities_discovered.name: George Mitchell
new_entities_discovered.role: Former US Senator and Senate Majority Leader (D-Maine). Named in victim allegations March 2011. On Epstein's Bannon list.

new_entities_discovered.name: Mort Zuckerman
new_entities_discovered.role: Media mogul, NY Daily News owner, Boston Properties. 70 documents in archive. Quoted praising Epstein in Vanity Fair 2011.

new_entities_discovered.name: Vicky Ward
new_entities_discovered.role: Journalist, wrote 2003 Vanity Fair 'The Talented Mr. Epstein' and 2011 follow-up on Maxwell.

new_entities_discovered.name: Jimmy Cayne
new_entities_discovered.role: Bear Stearns CEO. Named as early Epstein associate in Vanity Fair.

new_entities_discovered.name: Steven Jude Hoffenberg
new_entities_discovered.role: Towers Financial fraudster (20-year sentence). Claimed to be Epstein's mentor in Vanity Fair.

new_entities_discovered.name: Annette Witheridge
new_entities_discovered.role: Mail on Sunday journalist who sent victim allegations to Maxwell's lawyer March 2011.

new_entities_discovered.name: Mark Cohen
new_entities_discovered.role: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, received Mail on Sunday inquiry March 2011.

new_entities_discovered.name: Highbridge Capital
new_entities_discovered.role: Hedge fund co-founded by Glenn Dubin.

key_quotes.speaker: Boris Nikolic
key_quotes.quote: What is this??? When this will stop. This is crazy. And you are NOT 57;) And certainly you are NOT socially awkward. Who is that idiot.

key_quotes.speaker: Jeffrey Epstein
key_quotes.subject_line: told you, the case was a fake

key_quotes.speaker: Mort Zuckerman
key_quotes.quote: Jeffrey knows a good deal about most subjects

timeline_events.event: Vicky Ward writes 'The Talented Mr. Epstein' for Vanity Fair
Mail on Sunday sends victim allegations to Maxwell lawyer naming Dubin, Wexner, Barak, Mitchell, Kosslyn
Vicky Ward publishes follow-up article; Eva Dubin, Boris Nikolic react
Doe v. Trump dismissed; Epstein emails Eva Dubin 'told you, the case was a fake'
Glenn Dubin sends Epstein Michael Cohen New Yorker article
Boris Nikolic named backup executor in Epstein's will
